name: Mangayomi
subtitle: Mangayomi unofficial source.
description:
This is an unofficial source for Mangayomi.

For full details, check the GitHub repository:
https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi

apps.name: Mangayomi
apps.subtitle: Multiplatform app for reading manga, novels, and watching anime
apps.versionDescription:
What's Changed
* Update quarkuc extractor  by @yxxyun in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/393
* added long press for 2x playback speed by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/396
* fix broken category 
* add confirmation dialog for adding repositories


Full Changelog: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2
apps.localizedDescription: Mangayomi is an open-source Flutter app for reading manga, novels, and watching anime across multiple platforms.

versions.localizedDescription:
What's Changed
* Update quarkuc extractor  by @yxxyun in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/393
* added long press for 2x playback speed by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/396
* fix broken category 
* add confirmation dialog for adding repositories


Full Changelog: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2

What's Changed
* added deep links for repo urls by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/379
* enhanced sync feature by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/380
* optimized sync and bug fixes by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/381


Full Changelog: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

• improve chapter download
• improve custom navigation settings
• remove embedded URLs from extensions
• co•written with @Schnitzel5 : update source fetching methods to utilize the given repositories
